csc171.lab10.checkerboard

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc171.lab10.checkerboard.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a square on a checkerboard

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isSquareOccupied
      Denotes whether the square is currently occupied by a checker.
      private boolean isSquareRed
      Denotes whether the square is red or black.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Square(boolean isSquareRed)
      Creates a square object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isOccupied() 
      boolean isRed() 
      void setOccupied(boolean isSquareOccupied)
      Sets whether this square is occupied by a checker
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a String representation of the square suitable for printing to the commandline to visually represent the square and indicating color and occupation state.

    • Field Detail

      • isSquareRed

        private final boolean isSquareRed
        Denotes whether the square is red or black. Will not change over the life of the square.

      • isSquareOccupied

        private boolean isSquareOccupied
        Denotes whether the square is currently occupied by a checker. Will change over the life of the square.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        Creates a square object.
        Parameters:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a String representation of the square suitable for printing to the commandline to visually represent the square and indicating color and occupation state.
